ns1:Asset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - CM2012 - Install Primary
ns1:Asset.ns1:body:
# Load Common functions . .\Logging.ps1 . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\PlatformUtils.ps1
# get current script location $scriptPath = split-path -parent $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Definition $scriptName = $MyInvocation.MyCommand.Name
ConfigureLogging $scriptPath $scriptName
######################################################################### # Main #########################################################################
#Use ArgList variable in Start-Process commands so embedded variables and env variables resolve #START.exe is used with msiexec otherwise it does not wait
$DomainFQDN = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainFQDN")).value $DomainNetBIOS = (get-globalvariable("Global\DomainNetBIOS")).value $ServiceAccountName = "$DomainNetBIOS\$env:CM_ServiceAccount" $ServiceAccountPwd = get-serviceAccountPassword -username $env:CM_ServiceAccount.ToLower() #Covert to lowercase as get-serviceAccountPassword function is case sensitive $SQLServerName = (get-computername -ComponentID $env:SQL_ComponentID -InstanceID $env:SQL_InstanceID).ToUpper() $ComputerName = $env:ComputerName.ToUpper()
If ($DomainFQDN -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainFQDN not defined'; EXIT 1} If ($DomainNetBIOS -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $DomainNetBIOS not defined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountName -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountName not defined'; EXIT 1} If ($ServiceAccountPwd -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $ServiceAccountPwd not defined'; EXIT 1} If ($SQLServerName -eq $NULL) {Write-Host 'ERROR: $SQLServerName not defined'; EXIT 1}
Log "**** Starting: Primary Install... ****" Log "`n"
Log "Update ConfigMgr 2012 Primary Unattend file..." $INIFile = "$env:windir\Debug\ConfigMgr2012\$env:Computername\Unattend_$env:Computername.ini" Copy-Item "$ScriptPath\ConfigMgr\Scripts\Unattend_Template_PRI.ini" $INIFile -Force (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SiteCode=.*" , "SiteCode=$env:CM_SiteCode" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SiteName=.*" , "SiteName=$env:CM_SiteDescription" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SMSInstallDir=.*" , "SMSInstallDir=$env:CM_SMSInstallDir" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SDKServer=.*" , "SDKServer=$ComputerName.$DomainFQDN" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "PrerequisitePath=.*" , "PrerequisitePath=$ScriptPath\ConfigMgr\ConfigMgr 2012\ConfigMgr 2012 R2_Prereqs" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "ManagementPoint=.*" , "ManagementPoint=$ComputerName.$DomainFQDN" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "DistributionPoint=.*" , "DistributionPoint=$ComputerName.$DomainFQDN" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SQLServerName=.*" , "SQLServerName=$SQLServerName.$DomainFQDN" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "DatabaseName=.*" , "DatabaseName=$env:SQL_InstanceName\CM_$env:CM_SiteCode" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SQLDataFilePath=.*" , "SQLDataFilePath=$env:SQL_DataFilePath" } | Set-Content $INIFile (Get-Content $INIFile) | ForEach-Object { $_ -replace "SQLLogFilePath=.*" , "SQLLogFilePath=$env:SQL_LogFilePath" } | Set-Content $INIFile
Log "Installing ConfigMgr 2012 Primary..." $arglist = "/Script $INIFile /NoUserInput" $ret = LaunchProcessAsUser "$ScriptPath\ConfigMgr\ConfigMgr 2012\ConfigMgr 2012 R2 5.00.7958.1000\SMSSETUP\BIN\X64\setup.exe" $arglist $ServiceAccountName $ServiceAccountPwd If ($ret -ne 0) {Log "ERROR: ConfigMgr 2012 install failed"; EXIT 1} Log "`n" Start-Sleep -s 300
# Verify ConfigMgr is installed If (!(Test-Path "HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\SMS\Components\SMS_EXECUTIVE")) {Write-Host 'ERROR: ConfigMgr install not detected!'; EXIT 1}
Log "Installing POST ConfigMgr 2012 Updates..." Log " **KB3054451 | CU5 for ConfigMgr 2012 R2" # Log file output to %windir%\Temp $arglist = "/Unattended /NoSQLTimeout /NoMOFTimeout" $ret = LaunchProcessAsUser "$ScriptPath\ConfigMgr\Updates\ConfigMgr 2012\CU5 for ConfigMgr 2012 R2\CM12-R2CU5-KB3054451-X64-ENU.exe" $arglist $ServiceAccountName $ServiceAccountPwd If ($ret -ne 0 -and $ret -ne 3001) {Log "ERROR: ConfigMgr 2012 install failed"; EXIT 1} Log "`n" Start-Sleep -s 300
Log "**** Finished: Primary Install... ****"
